Prestige Estate Services

★★★★★ 4.5/5 (1 reviews)

About Prestige Estate Services

Prestige Estate Services provides professional art appraisal services in Cincinnati. With expertise in Fine art (19th–21st century), Antiques, Furniture, Insurance claims, Divorce settlements, Charitable donations, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.

Specialties

Fine art (19th–21st century)AntiquesFurnitureInsurance claimsDivorce settlementsCharitable donations

Services

  • Art appraisals
  • IRS-compliant valuations
  • Estate planning
  • Insurance valuation
  • Remote appraisal options

Pricing

On-site: $175–225/hour; Online photo appraisals: free initial review then $150–300/item

Certifications

  • ISA
  • ISA CAPP
  • USPAP
  • IRS-qualified

Contact Information

Location: Cincinnati, OH

Phone: 1-844-483-6825

Website: www.prestigeestateservices.com

Experience: Established business

Additional Information

Appraisers include Alicia E Weaver (ISA CAPP) and Erika Holycross (ISA member with auction-house experience). Services cover Greater Cincinnati and nationwide remote options.
